Nighlight:

Nightlight happyly followed him. When they were in corritor, she 
suddenly say "Can you come with me?, I like to show you something..."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:

> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus allowed Vampirtron to take the machine, and gave as much of 
a nod as he could when Vampirtron said thanks. Rodimus was more 
involved in the kiss from Nightlight. He of course returned the kiss.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Well now that everything is calm around here, shall 
we go?
> 
> Rodimus starts to walk out with his arm around Nightlight.
> 
> Rodimus Prime(as he passes the door): Good work Wheeljack.
